detail_desc: V-neck tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Patterned beach hat with a flounced brim and ties under the chin. Width of brim 6 cm.
Metal and plastic hoop earrings in various designs. Size from 2.5 to 3.5 cm.
Short dress in a washed viscose weave with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a turn-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Unicorn costume in soft velour with a sheen. Hood with embroidered details, appliqués and faux fur sections. Lightly padded wings on the back, a detachable tail, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Sports joggers in jersey made from a cotton blend with taped details. Elasticated waist, a slightly lower crotch with a ventilating mesh section, and zipped side pockets.
Jumper knitted in soft chenille yarn with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a small stand-up collar and zip at the top.
Fully lined, ribbed bikini bottoms with a high waist and medium coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, frill-trimmed shoulder straps and no fasteners. The polyester content of the bikini top is recycled.
Windbreaker in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details, a lined hood, zip at the top and slits in the sides.
Jacquard-patterned sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with long sleeves. Tight fit. Seamless.

Short, fitted, smocked dress in a crisp, patterned organic cotton weave. Square neckline and concealed elastication at the top to hold the dress in place. Long, wide sleeves with a voluminous puff at the shoulders and smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.
Jumper in a soft knit with a motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey.
Trousers in soft, patterned jersey with wide, elasticated smocking at the waist for a more comfortable fit. Side pockets, a low crotch and wide, tapered legs.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with short, wide sleeves and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and ties at one side. Unlined.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Metal chain necklace. Adjustable length 46-54 cm.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Jumpsuit in an airy, printed viscose weave with short flutter sleeves, elastication at the top of the back, buttons down the front and elasticated hems.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with removable inserts, decorative gathers at the front and smocking at the sides. Double, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and wide, concealed elastication at the hem. Light support.
Fitted dress in stretch jersey with a small stand-up collar, hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck, open back and seam at the waist.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with mesh sections and a racer back.
Grosgrain-covered plastic Alice band decorated with fabric flowers.

Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves. Close-fitting ribbing at the cuffs, and ribbing at the hem. Brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatshirt is recycled.
Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a hood, stand-up collar and chunky zip down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, welt side pockets with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with short sleeves. Elastication and a drawstring at the sides for a gently draped effect.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and zipped side pockets. Unlined.
Short satin parka with draped lapels and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Side pockets and long sleeves with a tab. No fasteners. Unlined.
Sleeveless playsuit in a viscose weave with an opening and press-stud at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs. Unlined.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps, and ties at the back.
Round metal clip earrings. Diameter approx. 3.6 cm.
Leggings in washed, patterned stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a fold-up hem.
Lightweight mesh trainers with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing, an imitation leather hook and loop tab and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a round neckline, and 3/4-length, open sleeves with ties at the cuffs.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a covered metal ring at the front of the hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.

Blouse in a softly draping weave with a round neck and small opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Gathered seams on the shoulders, long batwing sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Cap in cotton twill with a print motif on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a detachable belt with D-rings. Unlined.
Sandals with straps at the front and a wrapover ankle strap with an adjustable fastener. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Playsuit in a crinkled viscose weave with a gentle V-neck, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Shirt jacket in fleece made from a wool blend with a collar and buttons down the front. Front pockets, flap chest pockets with a button, and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. The wool content of the jacket is recycled.

Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in a double-layered organic cotton weave with frill-trimmed shoulder straps that cross at the back. Elastication and two flounces at the top, long legs with elasticated hems, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, a zipped key pocket at the back and legs with reflective print motifs and ventilating mesh sections at the hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Transparent silicone smartphone case with an adjustable fabric neck cord.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a sequin motif on the front, narrow ribbing around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

prod_name: BYN Put a ring on it
detail_desc: Long dress in woven fabric in a narrow cut at the top with an opening at the front and short, narrow shoulder straps that fasten at the back of the neck. Decorative appliqués on the front, an opening and concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and gathered skirt. Lined.
Cotton jersey hipster briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Shorter top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and short puff sleeves.
Lace dress with a zip at the back, gathered seam at the waist, 3/4-length sleeves and an airy chiffon skirt. Jersey lining.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details in a looser fit with a regular waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in a soft, fine cotton knit with a ribbed hem.
Baby Exclusive. Sun hat in soft linen with a cotton weave lining. Width of brim 5 cm.
V-neck top in a double layer of crêpe with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Gently flared style.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a lace yoke, small stand-up collar and partially concealed button placket. Short frilled lace sleeves, box pleat at the back and gently rounded hem.

Knee-length, off-the-shoulder dress in jersey crêpe with elastication around the neckline, 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce at the cuff, a seam at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Detachable elastic braces.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with pleats and buttons at the cuffs. Seam and a detachable D-ring belt at the waist. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft fluffy knit with a collar and wrapover V-neck, extra-long balloon sleeves with wide, ribbed cuffs, and ribbing at the hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a shirt and pair of shorts in airy linen. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Shorts with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets at the top and ribbed hems.
Captain’s cap. Lined.
